title: The Apprentice 2019 contestants: meet Lord Sugar's new candidates
text:
The Apprentice is back for – if you can believe it – a 15th series, beginning at 9pm on October 2.

Some things never change. Lord Sugar is still after someone he can give a £250,000 "life-changing" investment; Claude Littner and Baroness Brady are still the enforcers in the boardroom; the weekly tasks still involve a mixture of simplicity and (somehow) all the difficulty in the world.

And the contestants are as shy and retiring as ever. This year's 16 hopefuls are truly special. Let's meet them...
